original_title: Historic Travel US In the Grip of The Great Depression Volume II
overview: See how the people of Britton South Dakota faced up to the challenges thrown at them by the great depression of the 30s. Witness their resolute spirit and never-say-die attitude, in the fascinating films on this fabulous and historic DVD, the second of a two-volume set on South Dakota.
title: Historic Travel US In the Grip of The Great Depression Volume II
